import React from 'react'; import { useState } from 'react'; import { useLoaderData, Link } from 'react-router-dom'; /* ITP 404, Midterm Author: Carson Wang Email: carsonw@usc.edu This file is for the home page which shows user list of meals, and allow user to conduct search function. */ export default function heroSection() { document.getElementById('newsletterForm').onsubmit = function (event) { event.preventDefault(); // Prevent the default form submission const subscriberEmail = document.getElementById('subscriberEmail').value; // Here you would typically send the email to the server or email service fetch('/subscribe', { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' }, body: JSON.stringify({ email: subscriberEmail }) }) .then(response => response.json()) .then(data => { // You can show a success message or handle the response alert('Thank you for subscribing!'); // Clear the input field document.getElementById('subscriberEmail').value = ''; }) .catch(error => { // Handle errors here console.error('Error:', error); }); }; return (
